title: 14 day ???
body: Okay so When i was playing with my friends i got a 14 day ban because we were just joking around and he reported me as a joke (he told me he did) and he put POSITIVE things in the report thing but i still got banned for telling him he was bad because he was playing thresh top. I am a VERY honorable player (I am honor 5) so can you please look in to this because i have contributed so much of my time and money into this game and i don't think i can manage 2 weeks without it. username: fláming

replies.body: Ya they unbanned  me a day later with 25 game chat restriction lost honor 5 and no free rewards

> [{quoted}](name=Fláming,realm=NA,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=Bw5GMlrK,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2017-12-01T02:26:00.665+0000)
>
> Ya they unbanned  me a day later with 25 game chat restriction lost honor 5 and no free rewards

a semi good news story.
did you have any luck with support?

It's like making a joke around airport security - those guys are low iq minimum wage idiots on a massive power trip and have questionable rules on their side. Make one comment and they'll fuck you up because there is nothing you can do about it.

It is very much like that.
Why dont you just flame your friends on a Discord voice chat like a normal person?
why are you commenting on everyones things when you are so negative and you harass everyone go away foul
Don't hold your breath.  14 day suspensions are being handed out like Christmas presents atm.
